55.title: "Bone Voyage"
55.author: Charles Burns

56.title: "Bone Voyage"
56.author: by Charles Burns
56.appears_in: p. 91-96 in Heavy Metal, v. 8, no. 11 (Feb. 1985).
notes: "Story so far: James W. Rockbottom Jr., the son of a wealthy hotel and casino owner has hired El Borbah. It seems his girlfriend Walda Kissling has vanished into thin air. While visiting Walda's ex-boss, El Borbah encounters some minor difficulties."

57.title: "Bone Voyage"
57.author: by Charles Burns
57.appears_in: p. 27-32 in Heavy Metal, v. 8, no. 12 (Mar. 1985).
notes: "Story so far: While searching the ransacked apartment of Walda Kissling, El Borba finds a clue that leads him to a hotel called the Wishbone. At the bar he's given a drugged drink that knocks him on his ass."

58.title: "Bone Voyage"
58.author: by Charles Burns p
58.appears_in: 87-92 in Heavy Metal, v. 9, no. 13 (i.e., v. 9, no. 1) (Apr. 1985).
notes: "Story so far: El Borbah has been hired to find Walda Kissling. While following an obscure clue he stumbles onto a secret organization called Brothers of the Bone. At this moment they're after his ass." Call no.: PN6728.H43v.9no.1

59.title: "Bone Voyage"
59.author: by Charles Burns
59.appears_in: p. 34-39 in Heavy Metal, v. 9, no. 2 (May 1985).
notes: "Story so far: El Borbah is hot on the trail of Walda Kissling. He has just entered a resort called Bona Villa disguised as a member of the Brothers of the Bone."

60.title: "Bone Voyage"
60.author: by Charles Burns
60.appears_in: p. 88-93 in Heavy Metal, v. 9, no. 3 (June 1985).
notes: "Story so far: El Borbah has rescued a doped-up Walda Kissling from the Brothers of the Bone. Right now he's drying her out in a sleazy hotel room."

61.title: "A Bone Voyage : Jeff Smith's Success Story"
61.author: by R
61.appears_in: C. Harvey. p. 20-27 in Cartoonist Profiles, no. 130 (June 2001).
